title: Gorgeous 2 BD! Desirable Neighborhood! Close to Transportation
posting_body: ['Saxony Apartments has a Luxurious 2 bedroom unit available!', 'Rent: $2495', 'Deposit: $2495', 'FEATURES:', '2 Bedroom 2 Bath (Master Bedroom has its own Bathroom)', 'Fantastic Community!!', 'Lots of Closet Space', 'Laundry Facilities on Site', 'Easy Access To Major Highways', 'Close To Public Transportation and Bart Station!', 'Close To Morcom Rose Garden', 'Professionally Managed by E.E.N Property Management, Inc.', 'Non-Smoking Complex, No Pets.', 'Email Anthony Navarro for more information and showing dates.', '$40 credit check fee per adult over 18 made out to E.E.N Property Management, Inc.', "At the time of applying we will require a valid identification or Driver's License, 2 months proof of verifiable gross income, minimum verifiable 2.5x monthly rent, $40 credit check.", 'Thank you!!', 'Amenities:', '- Parking', '- Smoke Free', '- Elevator in Building', '- Garage', '- Balcony', 'Appliances:', '- Dishwasher', '- Garbage Disposal', '- Microwave', '- Refrigerator', '- Oven', '- Washer & Dryer On-Site', 'LeaseLengths:', '- 12 Months lease']
